description: Developed a full-stack URL Shortener using React.js, TailwindCSS, Vite, Supabase, and JavaScript. Features include user authentication, URL shortening with custom links, QR code generation, click tracking (count and location), personalized dashboards, and profile customization.

Built a Jio Cinema clone web application replicating the UI and functionality of the original platform. Used HTML, CSS, React, and JavaScript, incorporating video streaming features, user interface components, media management, dynamic routing, and state management.

Created an interactive sliding tiles puzzle game with smooth animations and intuitive gameplay using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Implemented dynamic tile movements and game logic to ensure an optimal user experience across devices.

Currently a 2nd-year B.Tech student in Artificial Intelligence at Newton School of Technology, Rishihood University, with a CGPA of 7.05/10. Graduated with 71.2% in Class XII from Mahatma Hansraj Modern School and 81.42% in Class X from Sun International School.

Detail-oriented and technically proficient Front-End Developer with a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, actively seeking an entry-level position to build responsive and user-centric websites.
Instagram handle @shivvansh_1101, where he shares posts about his life and interests.

Organized the first techno-cultural fest in college as a core committee member and head of marketing; serves as the head of marketing and content creation for Google Developer Groups at Rishihood University.
Has 1.5 years of hands-on experience in technical analysis and financial markets, including active trading and investment expertise.
Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Python, with additional skills in Node.js, Tailwind CSS, MySQL, and React. Completed additional coursework in Data Structures.
Strong in presentation skills, creativity, teamwork, and communication.

Active on LinkedIn (https://www.linkedin.com/in/shivansh-gupta-a0400827b/), GitHub (https://github.com/sshivanshg), CodeChef (https://www.codechef.com/users/sshivanshg), Codeforces (https://codeforces.com/profile/sshivanshg11), and LeetCode (https://leetcode.com/u/shivansh_7394/).
